name: Sleep is optional!
description:
A labor of love made from sleep deprived thoughts, and a love of watching Desert Bus for Hope.

In this game you are trying to watch as much of the Desert Bus for Hope run as possible, all while still taking care of yourself. Let a stat fall too far and you will lose a bonus multiplier, or even worse, it might descend into ruin! 

The large size/load time comes from the number of Desert Bus clips used, but I promise it is worth it, so please enjoy, and tweet me your high scores @Famout_Highwind , follow me at https://www.patreon.com/Famout for future projects!
